meanings: Assistant adverb do not (→-지 못하다, -지 말다)

vlive.korean: 갑자기 제가 들어가자 마자 '이대휘다! 대휘 형이다!' All of a sudden, when they saw me, "Ah! It's Daehwi!! It's hyung!" 듣기 View video AB6IX : ❤🧡
vlive.english: All of a sudden, when they saw me, "Ah! It's Daehwi!! It's hyung!"

vlive.korean: [어이없엉] - 마자용이 무슨 파란색이야 - 마자용? [No way] - He's not blue. - Majayong? 듣기 View video 잼플리 Jamfully : 그렇게 어렵다는 JYP 남돌 춤을 동시에 춰보았다 #GOT7 #StrayKids #DAY6 [이세퀴] 시즌2 EP.06
왜냐면 언니 원래 마피아들이 일어나자 마자 말이 많은 거 알죠? You know that when mafias wake up, they talk a lot? 듣기 View video GFRIEND : M6😁
vlive.english: You know that when mafias wake up, they talk a lot?

vlive.korean: 근데 여기 딱 서자마자 진짜 이거는 아닌데? - 오금이 저렸어? When I stood up on the tower, I thought it was impossible. - Too scared? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [FULL] OH MY GIRL X LieV - 오마이걸의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: When I stood up on the tower, I thought it was impossible. - Too scared?

vlive.korean: [챙겨서 왔는지 확인은 필수] 차 딱! 타자 마자 형 갖고 왔어? [Checking up if he brings the chip] As soon as I get on the car, "Did you bring it?" 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.2
vlive.english: [Checking up if he brings the chip] As soon as I get on the car, "Did you bring it?"

examples.korean: The doctor circumcised the baby boy shortly after birth. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 의사는 그 사내 아이가 태어나자 마자 바로 포경수술을 했다. Neungyule
